title: A mac issue
body: So I introduced my friend to league but there was 1 issue, which was before you can play the game you actually gotta open it up, but it stops there cause of an issue. The issue shows only for Mac users, that League can only run on a non-case sensitive system, can anyone help resolve this issue?

replies.body: Your friend might be having a network issue that's failing to reach the patching server and launch the client.  Have him run through our [connection issues](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues) guide to troubleshoot.  If the issue persists, though, have him put in a [support ticket](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new) so our tech team can help him directly.
